name: Delivery Place Type
description: The type of unit in which the baby was delivered.

concept.display: In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with midwife ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with consultant ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with GMP ward
In NHS hospital - delivery facilities associated with consultant/GMP/midwife ward inclusive of any combination of two of the professionals mentioned
In NHS hospital - ward or unit without delivery facilities
